segments.text: Every time I glance at that overflowing sink, I feel a wave of anxiety wash over me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s alarming to witness such a simple task spiraling into chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems completely unaware of the potential catastrophe at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t fathom how she doesn’t hear the water pouring out like a waterfall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are playing with fire, both literally and figuratively.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretched out, and my heart sinks as I imagine him falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a precarious game they’re playing, and it makes me feel uneasy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so expectant, and I can’t help but smile at her innocence.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that smile quickly fades when I remember how dangerous this all is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between the calm outside and the tension inside feels surreal.
segments.speaker: PAR
